root.title: handi harman hnh 4th qtr loss
root.body: shr loss 51 ct v loss three ct net loss 7,041,000 v loss 467,000 rev 138.9 mln v 131.4 mln 12 month shr loss 64 ct v profit 46 ct net loss 8,843,000 v profit 6,306,0000 rev 558.9 mln v 556.7 mln note net loss 4th qtr 1986 includ charg restructur 2.6 mln dlr tax 19 ct share 1986 net loss includ tax special charg 2.7 mln dlr 20 ct share
